editorialSummary.text: Bright hotel offering polished rooms with exercise gear, plus a 24-hour gym & a bar/restaurant.

originalText.text: I had a great stay at Even Hotel. The room was clean and lovely. The bed was very comfy. The only downside was the tiny closet. The staff were very friendly. Convenient location with walking distance to Times Square and Penn Station.

text.text: I had a great stay at Even Hotel. The room was clean and lovely. The bed was very comfy. The only downside was the tiny closet. The staff were very friendly. Convenient location with walking distance to Times Square and Penn Station.

originalText.text: I make it a point to stay here every time I‚Äôm in New York.  It‚Äôs a really quick walk (no more than 5 mins) to public transportation at Penn Station which has the Long Island Railroad (20 min ride to JFK airport), New Jersey Transit (25 min ride to Newark airport) and Amtrak.  Madison square garden is also right there to catch an event.  Ten min walk to Times Square.  Rooms are immaculately clean, beds are comfortable and the hotel and rooms are up to date and modern.  The front desk staff is very friendly and helpful.  They also have a room at the front desk where they can secure and lock up your luggage before you check in or after you check out so you can explore.  There is plenty to do and eat within walking distance.  I love this hotel.  Rooms are quiet, not many rooms on each floor, 25 floors in total in the hotel.

originalText.text: Excellent! I stayed over friday night and the room is spacious EXTRA CLEAN confortable and very convinient, coffe machine workedüëç Love the light under and above the bed, decoration is great, the staff was amazing thanks to sheila for helping us at the desk and being so nice, and everything else seemed to be brand new, the gym was clean and looked new as well. Elevators, bar all good. Wish my friend knew how to play pingpong ü•≤ Got on the list of one of my favorite hotels so far!

originalText.text: Stayed here for 5 nights for our first visit to New York for our 1st wedding anniversary. Location is great. Breakfast is also great and I would advise people to add Breakfast as its a good way to save some dollars eating in the expensive tourist spots. Rooms very clean and decent gym in the hotel. You can get your gym clothes laundered each day free of charge as well which is fantastic. Staff are also lovely. Overall I would recommend.

text.text: Stayed here for 5 nights for our first visit to New York for our 1st wedding anniversary. Location is great. Breakfast is also great and I would advise people to add Breakfast as its a good way to save some dollars eating in the expensive tourist spots. Rooms very clean and decent gym in the hotel. You can get your gym clothes laundered each day free of charge as well which is fantastic. Staff are also lovely. Overall I would recommend.

originalText.text:
Overall great stay. I'm happy to report that my family enjoyed their stay, and as a native New Yorker I was pleasantly surprised at the size of the rooms. I needed to find an affordable, comfortable, and conveniently located hotel. I'm glad I chose EVEN, bc I almost didn't due to some recent reviews. But I also know NY and the cost of accommodations during the holiday season. I booked my cousin and her son a double room which was extremely spacious for NY! Def a + and then location was another +. They were able to walk to Time Square, Rockefeller Center, and the EDGE which is walking distance. Also, my cousin's son loved the rainbow lights in the room. THANKS
EVEN for hosting my fam during the holidays.
